name: Fixation Marketing
description:
Positively obsessed with your success. It’s our mantra. From strategy to implementation and every step in between, we’re obsessed with providing the best client service, the strongest ideas, and the freshest executions – all to help you reach your marketing goals. It’s an obsession that spans nearly half a century, and no client is spared.
Associations, trade show producers, non-profits, sports teams, government organizations, the arts – even when serving as a creative partner for pr, research or other communications agencies, client success is what we’re all about.
